dshbrdCol.siz1: -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 20px magenta; -webkit-border-radius: 200vw; background: -webkit-gradient(radial, center center, 0, center center, 140, from(rgba(255,0,255,.2)), to(rgba(255,255,255,.7)));
dshbrdCol.siz2: -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 20px goldenrod; -webkit-border-radius: 200vw; background: -webkit-gradient(radial, center center, 0, center center, 140, from(rgba(218,165,32,.2)), to(rgba(255,255,255,.7)));
dshbrdCol.siz3: border: 3px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.02); -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 10px white; -webkit-border-radius: 200vw; background: -webkit-gradient(radial, center center, 0, center center, 200, from(rgba(255,255,255,.1)), to(rgba(255,255,255,.9)));
dshbrdCol.siz4: -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 20px lime; -webkit-border-radius: 200vw; background: -webkit-gradient(radial, center center, 0, center center, 140, from(rgba(0,255,0,.2)), to(rgba(255,255,255,.7)));
